segments.text: Hi , I ’ m Cindy , the office clerk . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , I ’ m Henry Wilson from number 37 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi Henry . How are you ? Is everything Okay in your apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Everything is fine in the apartment . But I know nothing about this area . Could I ask you some questions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me the postal code for this building ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s L8V 4B7 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Also , how can I get my mailbox key ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll tell Peter to bring your key to your apartment right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who ’ s Peter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He ’ s the superintendent of this building .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . I ’ Ve got one more question .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Go ahead , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where can I change the address on my driver ’ s license ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Department of Motor Vehicles office is at 212 Barton Street North .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you give me directions to the office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are at 2368 King Street East .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , it ’ s easy to get to the office from here . From your apartment , just drive along King Street East for about one kilometer and you ’ ll see a three-story blue building on your right . That ’ s the Department of Motor Vehicles building where you can change your driver ’ s license .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What floor is the office on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s on the first floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are very welcome .
segments.speaker: S1
